snippet: France said it would soon propose a resolution to establish a large, robust United Nations peacekeeping force, and the United States expressed support.
abstract: Violence in Central African Republic jolts United Nations Security Council into rare accord; France says it will propose resolution to establish large and robust United Nations peacekeeping force and United States expresses full support.
lead_paragraph: France said it would soon propose a resolution to establish a large, robust United Nations peacekeeping force, and the United States expressed support.

headline.main: United Nations to Consider Large Peacekeeping Force for Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: Seeking a Robust Central African Force
